thread.title: FIFA investigating Mangala transfer

author: Former NBA star Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel
title: FIFA investigating Mangala transfer
text:
FIFA investigating Mangala transfer Goal.com 5 hrs ago Â© Provided by Goal.com Eliaquim Mangala's transfer to Manchester City from Porto last year is being investigated by FIFA amid suggestions the switch contravened third-party ownership rules.
AdChoices Mangala moved to the Etihad Stadium from the Primeira Liga side in August last year - Porto receiving 30.5 million euros for 56.67 percent of the player's rights. While third-party ownership was banned by FIFA in May, private equity fund Doyen Sports had invested in Mangala prior to his departure for England.
"We are looking into this," a FIFA spokesperson told Omnisport when asked about the transfer.
Third-party ownership was particularly common in Portugal, with Doyen having also invested in Manchester United defender Marcos Rojo - formerly of Sporting CP.
